title: Bug 5340 - Ineffective Cancellation of Adding Exception Breakpoint
description: This bug report addresses the issue of canceling the addition of an exception breakpoint having no effect.
OB: Upon attempting to cancel the addition of an exception breakpoint, the observed behavior is not mentioned.
EB: The expected behavior is that cancelling the addition of an exception breakpoint should effectively terminate the operation without any further processing.
SR:
To reproduce the issue:
1. Go to the breakpoints pane in the debug perspective.
2. Click the 'J!' button to add an exception.
3. In the progress dialog, click the 'Cancel' button.
